sentences.en: 'I call myself the Samson of the firewood guillotine.
sentences.cn: “ 我把我自己叫作木柴断头台的参孙.

sentences.en: As long as the green hills are there, one need not worry about firewood.
sentences.cn: 留得青山在, 不愁没柴烧.

sentences.en: Cutting down fruit trees for firewood is a case of killing the goose that lays the golden eggs.
sentences.cn: 砍倒果树当柴烧,这是杀鸡取卵.

sentences.en: He awoke to find himself lying uncomfortably on a pile of firewood.
sentences.cn: 他醒来发现自己躺在一堆柴火上，很不舒服。

sentences.en: He cut down the tree and cut it up for firewood.
sentences.cn: 他把树砍倒,并把它劈成烧火用的小块.

sentences.en: He earned his living cutting firewood in the hills.
He has already sawn the branches up; now we have plenty of firewood.
sentences.cn: 他已把树枝锯成小段, 现在我们有足够的木柴了.

sentences.en: He stacked the firewood in the backyard.
I saw a bundle of firewood on the floor.
sentences.cn: 我看见了一捆劈柴在地板上.

sentences.en: I suggest we gather enough firewood to last the night.
sentences.cn: 我建议大家捡足够多的木柴来撑过这一晚。

sentences.en: Sometimes they have to chop down a tree for firewood.
sentences.cn: 他们有时只好砍树当柴烧。

sentences.en: The burning firewood sent up clouds of smoke.
sentences.cn: 燃烧着的木柴冒出滚滚浓烟.

sentences.en: The country girl gathered some firewood.
sentences.cn: 那个农家姑娘拾了些柴火.

sentences.en: Turn the firewood over and sun it.
Two young girls were collecting firewood.
sentences.cn: 两个小女孩正在拾柴火。

sentences.en: Young Geoffrey made money by chopping and selling firewood.
sentences.cn: 年轻的杰弗里靠砍柴卖柴挣钱。

trans.tran_en: wood that has been cut or collected in order to be burned in a fire
